reviews.review: Full of cheaters and smurfs, matchmaking is awful, market is used for money laundering and Valve does not care at all.

3000+ hours fun with friends solo can get annoying with random people. Community  is fun dependant on the server you play on. 1 important thing is to learn recoil of guns before you complain. Also if you start this game don't be a sniper addict learn all the weapons you can. Please don't be a AWP snob.

This is a fun FPS. The variety of guns really adds something to the game because each gun is different and they even have stats. The only complaint i would give is that the community can sometimes be toxic.

Ну начнём с азов, кс это  игра не для детей. Они здесь превратятся в ебыпей-терористов, у меня есть друг, гей у него 179 часов он не дно, и в жизни вроде одыкватный но в игре превращается в токсичного гея. Советую играть если не испытаваете недостатка в хромосомах. У самого появились замащки видь игра про геев :)

Fun game that challenges a player to be there best with a very high skill ceiling.

Valve does not care for this game as it doesn't make as much money as Dota. However, CSGO has a dedicated player base, shitposts in silver and third party matchmaking because 64 tick sucks.Good game because of the community, bad because of Valve.

CS: GO stands as a glowing reminder that quality game design is rewarded in longevity and variety. Valve has not only updated the shooter but has completely outclassed its contemporaries. This is Counter-Strike, whatever the format you choose to play it on, and there isn't a higher recommendation than that.
